home.description: Welcome to my website! I'm a lifelong learner and builder of software. Here you'll find my projects, curriculum, experiences, and much more. Feel free to explore and get in touch with me :)
home.featured_desc: A selection of my recent work and experiments.

card1.title: Facial Recognition System with AI for medical applications - Mondragon, Spain.
card1.description: This system was developed in a team at Mondragon University. The idea is to use a Convolutional Neural Network model for facial recognition and retrieval of medical information about patients.

card2.title: Library Management System 'Genius Lab'.
card2.description: This project earned me my first internship. Developed in Django with a PostgreSQL database, the project is a library management system with features for borrowing, returning, registering books and users, and generating reports.

card3.title: Bingo! Have fun with your friends.
card3.description: I did this project more for the technical challenge. It was built using only JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, without frameworks. The idea came up because we have bingo cards at home, but we didn't have anything to draw and play with friends. It's a very simple but functional project.

work_in_progress.title: Oops! Page under construction.
work_in_progress.description: This page is still under construction. Our best cat engineers are working on it!

cv.summary: I am really keen on learning in practice and transmitting knowledge. At university, I get involved in extracurricular activities whenever possible. I communicate and handle teamwork very well. I have developed fullstack projects using Python, Django, TypeScript, NextJs, VueJs and more.

experience.description: I studied a whole semester in Spain. There, I took courses on Software Engineering, Artificial Intelligence, Project Management, and Data Analysis. I also worked in group and developed a project on facial recognition using Convolutional Neural Networks to medical applications.

I worked as a VueJs developer, constructing new features and refactoring, cooperating with the development team to create new features. Dealing with TypeScript, VueJs, GitLab, and Vitest for automated tests.

I worked as a Python/Django developer maintaining a management system and cooperating with the development team to create new features. Dealing with Python, JavaScript, Docker, Celery, and Selenium for automated tests.
Developer at a university project that introduces students to the business world.
I worked as a Programming Tutor on the CODE project, a project by the Jo√£o Pessoa education department to introduce elementary school children to algorithms and programming.

I participated as a developer on the first class of Django Developers Brasil, a project built to simulate a real work environment while learning Django Framework. We worked on a project from sketch to production.

extra.title: Event Speaker - IFTECH 2025
extra.description: Taught a course of introduction to Unit Tests using Vitest.

extra.title: Teaching Assistant - Human Computer Interaction
extra.description: Teaching assistant for the Human Computer Interaction course. The course is focused on the principles of usability and UI/UX.

extra.title: Event Speaker - IFTECH 2024
extra.description: I taught a course named 'Git and Github: a survival guide', offered at IFTECH, the main annual event of the IFPB IT unit.

extra.title: Teaching Assistant - Algorithms
extra.description: Teaching assistant for the algorithms and structured programming course using Python.

extra.title: IA and IOT training by IFPB Innovation Hub
extra.description: I took the training course offered by the IFPB Innovation Hub (Assert Laboratory). In it, I was able to learn in more depth how AI algorithms and IOT systems work, as well as develop projects on both topics.

extra.title: Introduction to Competitive Programming
extra.description: I participated in the training carried out by the IFPB's Olympic Programming Project focusing on algorithms and data structures and competition problems. The course is taken using C++.
